20.eng-name: The Book on Vows and Oaths
20.ara-name: كتاب النذور والأيمان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Suwaid bin Muqarrin Al-Muzani:"We were seven brothers without a servant except one, and one of us slapped her, so the Prophet (ﷺ) ordered us to free her

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرَّجُلِ يَلْطِمُ خَادِمَهُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About A Man Who Slaps His Servant
